```{r, include = F}
# for loading our data
library(countries)
library(raster)
library(readr)
library(readxl)
library(sf)
# for datasets
library(maps)
library(spData)
# for plotting
library(grid)
library(tmap)
library(viridis)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
World <- tmap::World
```

```{r, include = F}
data <- read_csv("data/economics_and_education_dataset_CSV.csv") %>% 
  mutate(iso_a3 = country_name(index_code))
d2000s <- data %>% filter(time > 2001, time <= 2009) %>% 
  summarise(mmri = mean(mortality_rate_infant),
            unemployment = mean(unemployment), .by = c("time", "iso_a3"))
d2010s <- data %>% filter(time > 2010, time <= 2020) %>% 
  summarise(mmri = mean(mortality_rate_infant),
            unemployment = mean(unemployment), .by = c("time", "iso_a3"))
```

```{r, include = F}
joint2000 <- World %>% left_join(d2000s, by = "iso_a3") %>% 
  #filter(continent == "Europe") %>% 
  group_by(iso_a3) %>% slice_sample(n = 1) %>% 
  na.omit()
```

```{r, include = F}
joint2010 <- World %>% left_join(d2010s, by = "iso_a3") %>% 
  #filter(continent == "Europe") %>% 
  group_by(iso_a3) %>% slice_sample(n = 1) %>%  
  na.omit()
```
